title: Bekendtgørelse om kvælstofprognosen for planperioden 2014/2015
description: Retsinformation source. DocumentId=AH005533; AccessionNumber=B20150025205; Characters preserved in NFC; ASCII fallback used only for key/file generation.

provisions.content: § 1. For arealer med korn og forårssåede afgrøder, der har en højere kvælstofkvote end 0 kg N pr. ha, og som er nævnt i bilag 1, tabel 1, til bekendtgørelse om jordbrugets anvendelse af gødning i planperioden 2014/2015 og om plantedække, skal jordbrugsvirksomheder ved beregningen af den samlede kvote for planperioden anvende følgende korrektioner i kg N pr. ha, afhængig af jordtype: Grovsand border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; Finsand border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; Lerjord border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; JB 1 og JB 3 border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; JB 2 og JB 4 border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; JB over 4 border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; 0 border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; 5 border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; 10 border-top: 1pt solid #000000; border-left: 1pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 1pt solid #000000; border-right: 1pt solid #000000; grid-H: 1pt solid #000000; grid-V: 1pt solid #000000; 310 0.2cm,0.2cm,0.2cm,0.2cm column-width: 77pt 77pt 77pt;
§ 2. Bekendtgørelsen træder i kraft den 19. marts 2015.
